note: I build and tinker with things to help other folks build and tinker with things. I like building and maintaining communities. Sometimes I make art. I think exercised empathy, being good epistemic agents, and creating/using FOSS are all very important things humans ought to have and do. Sometimes I fail at being who I aspire to be and that's ok.

fields.name: Politics
fields.value: Antifascist. Be practical. Help people. No gods. No masters.
